import { Predicate } from 'isntnt'
import {
  Nullable,
  SerializableValue,
  ValuesOf,
  WithoutNever,
} from '../utils/generics'
import { AnyResource, ResourceType } from './Resource'
import { ResourceIdentifierKey, ResourceIdentifier } from './ResourceIdentifier'

export type AnyResourceField = ResourceField<any>
export type AnyResourceAttributeField = ResourceAttributeField<any>
export type AnyResourceRelationshipField = ResourceRelationshipField<any>
export type AnyResourceToOneRelationshipField = ResourceToOneRelationshipField<
  any
>
export type AnyResourceToManyRelationshipField = ResourceToManyRelationshipField<
  any
>

export type ResourceFieldRoot = Nullable<'attributes' | 'relationships'>

export type ResourceFieldName = string

export type ResourceFieldValue =
  | ResourceAttributeFieldValue
  | ResourceRelationshipFieldValue<AnyResource>

export type ResourceAttributeFieldValue =
  | ResourceOptionalAttributeFieldValue
  | ResourceRequiredAttributeFieldValue

export type ResourceOptionalAttributeFieldValue = SerializableValue
export type ResourceRequiredAttributeFieldValue = Exclude<
  SerializableValue,
  null
>

export type ResourceAttributeFields<R extends AnyResource> = WithoutNever<
  {
    [K in keyof R]: K extends ResourceIdentifierKey
      ? never
      : R[K] extends ResourceRelationshipFieldValue<AnyResource>
      ? never
      : R[K]
  }
>

export type ResourceRelationshipFieldIdentifierValue<T extends ResourceType> =
  | ResourceToOneRelationshipFieldIdentifierValue<T>
  | ResourceToManyRelationshipFieldIdentifierValue<T>

export type ResourceToOneRelationshipFieldIdentifierValue<
  T extends ResourceType
> = Nullable<ResourceIdentifier<T>>

export type ResourceToManyRelationshipFieldIdentifierValue<
  T extends ResourceType
> = Array<ResourceIdentifier<T>>

export type ResourceToOneRelationshipFieldValue<
  R extends AnyResource
> = Nullable<R>
export type ResourceToManyRelationshipFieldValue<R extends AnyResource> = Array<
  R
>

export type ResourceRelationshipFieldValue<R extends AnyResource> =
  | ResourceToOneRelationshipFieldValue<R>
  | ResourceToManyRelationshipFieldValue<R>

export type ResourceFields<R extends AnyResource> = WithoutNever<
  {
    [K in keyof R]: K extends ResourceIdentifierKey
      ? R[K] extends ValuesOf<AnyResource>
        ? R[K]
        : never
      : R[K] extends ResourceFieldValue
      ? R[K]
      : never
  }
>

export type ResourceRelationshipType = 'to-one' | 'to-many'

export type ResourceRelationshipFields<R extends AnyResource> = WithoutNever<
  {
    [K in keyof R]: K extends ResourceIdentifierKey
      ? never
      : R[K] extends ResourceRelationshipFieldValue<AnyResource>
      ? R[K]
      : never
  }
>

export type ResourceFieldNames<R extends AnyResource> = Extract<
  Exclude<keyof R, ResourceIdentifierKey>,
  ResourceFieldName
>

export type ResourceAttributeFieldNames<R extends AnyResource> = Extract<
  keyof ResourceAttributeFields<R>,
  ResourceFieldName
>

export type ResourceRelationshipFieldNames<R extends AnyResource> = Extract<
  keyof ResourceRelationshipFields<R>,
  ResourceFieldName
>

export class ResourceField<T extends ResourceFieldValue> {
  name: ResourceFieldName
  root: ResourceFieldRoot = null
  validate: Predicate<ResourceFieldValue>

  constructor(name: ResourceFieldName, validate: Predicate<T>) {
    this.name = name
    this.validate = validate
  }

  isAttributeField(): this is AnyResourceAttributeField {
    return false
  }

  isRequiredAttributeField(): this is ResourceAttributeField<
    ResourceRequiredAttributeFieldValue
  > {
    return this.isAttributeField() && this.required === true
  }

  isOptionalAttributeField(): this is ResourceAttributeField<
    ResourceOptionalAttributeFieldValue
  > {
    return this.isAttributeField() && this.required === false
  }

  isRelationshipField(): this is AnyResourceRelationshipField {
    return false
  }

  isToOneRelationshipField(): this is AnyResourceToOneRelationshipField {
    return false
  }

  isToManyRelationshipField(): this is AnyResourceToManyRelationshipField {
    return false
  }
}

export class ResourceAttributeField<
  T extends ResourceAttributeFieldValue
> extends ResourceField<T> {
  readonly required: boolean

  constructor(
    name: ResourceFieldName,
    required: boolean,
    validate: Predicate<T>,
  ) {
    super(name, validate)
    this.required = required
  }

  isAttributeField(): this is AnyResourceAttributeField {
    return true
  }
}

export class ResourceRelationshipField<
  T extends ResourceType
> extends ResourceField<ResourceRelationshipFieldIdentifierValue<T>> {
  readonly type: ResourceType

  constructor(
    name: ResourceFieldName,
    validate: Predicate<ResourceRelationshipFieldIdentifierValue<T>>,
    type: ResourceType,
  ) {
    super(name, validate)
    this.type = type
  }

  isRelationshipField(): this is ResourceRelationshipField<T> {
    return true
  }
}

export class ResourceToOneRelationshipField<
  T extends ResourceType
> extends ResourceRelationshipField<T> {
  isToOneRelationshipField(): this is ResourceToOneRelationshipField<T> {
    return true
  }
}

export class ResourceToManyRelationshipField<
  T extends ResourceType
> extends ResourceRelationshipField<T> {
  isToManyRelationshipField(): this is ResourceToManyRelationshipField<T> {
    return true
  }
}
